page.title: 06Trade Crosthwaite'area'
page.content: There are two{shops}in the Crosthwaite 'area',one in the hamlet of Bowland Bridge and one in Crosthwaite Village. They are both{General Stores}combined with{Post Offices.}In both cases the owners live on the premises.Bowland Bridge shop is open every day of the week from{8 a.m.to 8 p.m.}<It has one petrol pump,the only one in a radius of some 5/7 miles.>Crosthwaite is open from {9 a.m.to 6 p. m.}Monday to Saturday except Wednesday when both close at lunchtime. Both shops have a large variety of sweets and these are the most popular items at Bowland Bridge but at Crosthwaite sugar is top of the list. The most expensive items are toys at Crosthwaite and purses and wallets at Bowland Bridge. The cheapest are{1p chews.}Both shops increase their trade when summer visitors come to the area.
